Text.Page:
Our man Tapa here has never heard of ground carlams pepper! It's only the most delicious spice ever!

His grilled pigling is very good, but a little carlams sprinkled on top would really take it up a notch.

Carlams pepper grows in Tuwangi Mire. The most flavorful peppercorns are those that have been eaten by swamp toads. When dried, they have the most delectible flavor.

Want to make a little something on the side, soldier? Get some freshly-eaten peppercorns and take them to Huchu in Pora Elinu. He trades fresh for dried straight across.

Fresh carlams peppercorns! I can smell the toad belly on you. These are just right for drying.

I'll give you this portly bag of recently dried and ground pepper in exchange.

Do we have a deal?
Bring me that pepper and I'll make it worth your while.

A whole bag!

Tapa will be blown away by this stuff.

Thanks, friend.
